title: GenAI and entrepreneurship - how the world of demand is changing
description: GenAI is reshaping the conversation in every board room. It is revolutionising entrepreneurship by reshaping the economy of demand. With AI driven innovation, businesses are anticipating a tectonic shift in the way they work. Even industries as traditional as cement manufacturing or newspaper printing are reimagining business. How can you grab that opportunity as an entrepreneur?

comment: Exploring the future of quantum computing
title: Quantum Computing - Breaking the Barriers of Classical Systems
description: Quantum computing is no longer a distant dream. With advancements in quantum algorithms and hardware, industries are preparing for a computational revolution. This lecture delves into the latest breakthroughs, challenges, and real-world applications of quantum computing.

title: Neuroscience and AI - The Next Frontier
description: Artificial intelligence is increasingly inspired by human cognition. This talk explores how neuroscience is influencing AI models, from brain-inspired architectures to real-world applications in healthcare and robotics.

comment: A deep dive into blockchain scalability
title: Blockchain Beyond Bitcoin - Scalability and Real-World Adoption
description: Blockchain technology is evolving beyond cryptocurrencies. With emerging solutions like Layer 2 protocols and sharding, scalability is improving, enabling blockchain to revolutionize finance, supply chains, and beyond. This session provides insights into the latest developments.
